title: Kids Crazy Soundboard
features: Keep the kids (and adults) amused for hours
Bring your stories to life with fantastic sound effects.
description: Kids Crazy SoundboardHere's a stacked sound board with loads of fabulous and quirky noises to amuse (or annoy) your fiends and family.There are explosions, animal noises, aliens, sirens, trains, tanks, cars, Tarzan calls, etc. far too many to mention, but of course we also include the obligatory whoopee cushion.While reading to the little ones, try inserting some fantastic sounds effects that really bring those books to life. Play a game with friends, make up your own ridiculous stories inserting as many sound effects as possible along the way. Wake the kids up in the morning to the sound of a cockerel, did somebody leave a tap dripping, is that a cow in the kitchen, the possibilities are endless.Either way hours of free fun.Kids Crazy Soundboard, It will bring out the kid in all of us!
